title: About Me!
description: Hi! I'm Azam Shah, a passionate front-end developer dedicated to building user-friendly, visually appealing, and high-performing web applications. With expertise in modern technologies like React, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, CSS, React-Native and Next.js, I bring creativity and technical skills together to craft seamless digital experiences.From designing intuitive interfaces to deploying fully responsive websites, my goal is to deliver impactful solutions that leave a lasting impression. Explore my projects to see how I turn ideas into reality!
